meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or practicing polygamy.
meanings.sent1: The polygamous man had more than one wife.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, polygamous relationships are accepted.
meanings.sent3: The polygamous family had a very crowded dinner table.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was polygamous, as she tended to multiple flower beds.
meanings.sent5: The polygamous nature of the bee colony fascinated the biologist.
